import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import {FormGroup, FormBuilder} from '@angular/forms'; @Component({ selector: 'app-registration', templateUrl: './registration.component.html', styleUrls: ['./registration.component.css'] }) export class RegistrationComponent { public signupForm! : FormGroup; constructor(private formBuilder: FormBuilder){} ngOnInit():void{ this.signupForm = this.formBuilder.group({ fullname: [''], email:[''], password:[''], mobile:[''] }); } }
